item.mcpaint.illegal_item: Uh oh, you're not supposed to have this.
item.mcpaint.custom_painting.lore.author: %s
mcpaint.advancements.root.title: MC Paint!
mcpaint.advancements.apply_egg.title: True Tempera Paint
mcpaint.advancements.apply_egg.descripti: Apply a healthy dose of Egg to a Minecraft Painting
mcpaint.advancements.place_custom_painti: Export and place your first custom painting
mcpaint.advancements.save_work.title: Save and Sound
mcpaint.advancements.save_work.descripti: Save your first work to a file
mcpaint.advancements.load_work.title: We Need to Go Back
mcpaint.advancements.load_work.descripti: Load up one of your previous works in the Studio
mcpaint.advancements.delete_work.title: Lost to the Ages
mcpaint.advancements.delete_work.descrip: Delete one of your works from the Studio's file manager
mcpaint.advancements.set_glowing.title: A Touch of Radium Green
mcpaint.advancements.set_glowing.descrip: Use a Glow Ink Sac on a custom painting to make it glow in the dark
mcpaint.advancements.set_no_background.d: Use Shears on a custom painting to remove the background
mcpaint.advancements.roll_custom_paintin: Use a Compass on a custom painting to rotate it
mcpaint.advancements.custom_painting_lor: Use a Book and Quill on a custom painting to give it a description
mcpaint.advancements.paint_bucket_html.d: Set the colour in a Paint Bucket to an HTML value
mcpaint.advancements.use_dye.title: Conventional Colours
mcpaint.advancements.use_dye.description: Set the colour in a Paint Bucket from a Dye item
mcpaint.error.cannot_find_item: You do not have a %s in your offhand or hotbar.
mcpaint.error.cannot_find_item_in_offhan: You do not have a %s in your offhand.
mcpaint.error.invalid_filename_length: Filenames must be between %s and %s characters long.
mcpaint.error.file_already_exists: The file "%s" already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
mcpaint.error.cannot_craft_custom_painti: You need to have a %s to do this.
mcpaint.error.not_saved_yet: Paintings must to be saved to a file before exporting.
mcpaint.error.load_while_unsaved: The current file has unsaved changes. Discard changes and load anyway?
mcpaint.error.new_file_while_unsaved: The current file has unsaved changes. Discard changes and create a new file anyway?
mcpaint.error.no_permission: You do not have permissions for this.
mcpaint.error.b64.invalid_header: This code's header is invalid. Make sure you have copied the right text.
mcpaint.error.b64.invalid_size: Error while parsing: invalid painting dimensions
mcpaint.error.b64.trailing_data: Error while parsing: trailing data found. Make sure you copied the right pages.
mcpaint.error.b64.unexpected_eof: Error while parsing: unexpected EOF. Make sure you copied all the right pages.
mcpaint.error.invalid_html_colour: Invalid string for HTML colour: "%s". Valid example: "#029A2F".
mcpaint.error.uninstall_warning: Are you sure you want to uninstall MC Paint from your world? This will delete all placed blocks and permanently delete all files. This cannot be undone!
mcpaint.ui.button.image_converter_websit: Click to open the Image Converter website
mcpaint.ui.description.import_code: To import an external painting, copy all parts of the MC Paint Painting Format code into separate pages of a Book and Quill and click the button below. You can copy this code from elsewhere, or generate one using the linked Image Converter.
mcpaint.message.egg_banter.2: <Kristoffer Zetterstrand> So you think you can do better?
mcpaint.message.egg_banter.3: <Kristoffer Zetterstrand> Show me what you got!
mcpaint.message.custom_painting_will_sho: Right-clicking with an empty hand will display:
mcpaint.message.confirm_delete_file: Are you sure you want to delete "%s"? This action cannot be undone.
mcpaint.message.resource_pack_reload.inf: If canvases are shifted or off-centered after reloading the resource pack, you can use /trigger mcpaint.reload to reload nearby text displays.
mcpaint.message.resource_pack_dismiss.in: Do not show this message again
mcpaint.message.resource_pack_dismissed: Dismissed message. You can re-enable the message in the %s.
mcpaint.message.reload_text_displays.can: There are no Text Displays to update.
mcpaint.message.welcome.thanks: Thank you for installing MC Paint!
mcpaint.message.contributors.creator: Datapack Creator
Sends a message 10 seconds after joining the game informing you of the status of the installed Resource Pack and an explanation of the /trigger mcpaint.reload command
mcpaint.settings.client.protect_studio.i: Prevent other players from accessing a Studio where you have a saved file open.
mcpaint.settings.client.egg_banter.title: Egg Banter
mcpaint.settings.client.egg_banter.info: When creating a Studio, Kristoffer Zetterstrand will verbally challenge you to show your artistic skills.
mcpaint.settings.server.allow_decode.inf: Allow players to import base64 encoded external paintings in the Studio.
